duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure all mail incoming and outgoing is scanned, recorded and submitted to the appropriate party.
General financial tasks including bank deposits and cutting checks.
Assist in managing vendor dashboard for RA's and FQ's along with managed report services.
Support on-site and remote staff with administrative tasks.
Maintain fingerprint cards and archive database.
Create and maintain organized client files.
Responsibilities and tasks outlined in this document are not exhaustive and may change as determined by the needs of the company and/or it's clients.
